author: sscruz
body:
#### PR description:
This PR includes the following items regarding the muon MVA
- Bugfix for several input variables for the muon MVA: dxy, charged and neutral components of miniisolation
- Update to the new BDT weights and additional working points
- Addition of a new low pt MVA
- Setting some unsupported selectors to 0

#### PR validation:
PR has been tested with workflow 136.863
title: Updating training of MVA, adding low pt MVA and bugfix (muon POG)
